CopyMethodGenerator.java

6 package com.chenjw.knife.bytecode.javassist.method;
7 
8 import java.util.ArrayList;
9 import java.util.List;
10 import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong;
11 
12 import javassist.CannotCompileException;
13 import javassist.CtClass;
14 import javassist.CtMethod;
15 import javassist.CtNewMethod;
16 import javassist.Modifier;
17 import javassist.NotFoundException;
18 
19 import com.chenjw.knife.bytecode.javassist.ClassGenerator;
20 import com.chenjw.knife.bytecode.javassist.Expression;
21 import com.chenjw.knife.bytecode.javassist.Field;
22 import com.chenjw.knife.bytecode.javassist.MethodGenerator;
23 import com.chenjw.knife.utils.ClassHelper;
24 
30 public final class CopyMethodGenerator implements MethodGenerator {
31 
32  private final AtomicLong METHOD_COUNTER = new AtomicLong(0);
33  private final AtomicLong METHOD_VARIABLE_COUNTER = new AtomicLong(0);
34 
35  private CtMethod oldCtMethod;
36  private List<String> methodLines = new ArrayList<String>();
37 
38  public void generate(CtClass ctClass) throws CannotCompileException {
39  String newMethodName = generateMethodName(oldCtMethod.getName());
40  CtMethod newCtMethod = CtNewMethod.copy(oldCtMethod, newMethodName,
41  ctClass, null);
42  newCtMethod
43  .setModifiers(newCtMethod.getModifiers() & ~Modifier.PRIVATE);
44  StringBuffer sb = new StringBuffer();
45  sb.append("{");
46  for (String line : methodLines) {
47  sb.append(line);
48  }
49  sb.append("}");
50  oldCtMethod.setBody(sb.toString());
51  ctClass.addMethod(newCtMethod);
52  }
53 
54  public static CopyMethodGenerator newInstance(
55  ClassGenerator classGenerator, String methodDesc) {
56  return new CopyMethodGenerator(classGenerator, methodDesc);
57  }
58 
59  private CopyMethodGenerator(ClassGenerator classGenerator, String methodDesc) {
60  try {
61  this.oldCtMethod = classGenerator.getCtClass().getDeclaredMethod(
62  methodDesc);
63  } catch (NotFoundException e) {
64  e.printStackTrace();
65  }
66  }
67 
68  public List<String> getMethodLines() {
69  return methodLines;
70  }
71 
77  private String generateMethodName(String oldMethodName) {
78  return oldMethodName + "$" + METHOD_COUNTER.getAndIncrement();
79  }
80 
86  private String generateMethodVariableName() {
87  return "tmp_mv_" + METHOD_VARIABLE_COUNTER.getAndIncrement();
88  }
89 
97  public Field addLocalVariableDefine(Class<?> type, Expression expr) {
98  String name = generateMethodVariableName();
99  StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
100  sb.append(ClassHelper.makeClassName(type)).append(' ');
101  sb.append(name);
102  if (expr != null) {
103  sb.append('=');
104  sb.append(expr.cast(type).getCode());
105  }
106  sb.append(';');
107  methodLines.add(sb.toString());
108  return new Field(name, type, false);
109  }
110 
118  public void addVariableAssign(Field field, Expression expr) {
119  if (field.isFinal()) {
120  throw new IllegalStateException("final field(" + field.getCode()
121  + ") cant be assign");
122  }
123  StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
124  sb.append(field.getCode());
125  sb.append('=');
126  sb.append(expr.cast(field.getType()).getCode());
127  sb.append(';');
128  methodLines.add(sb.toString());
129  }
130 
136  public void addExpression(Expression expr) {
137  methodLines.add(expr.getCode() + ';');
138  }
139 
140 }
